name: fake-store
description: Fake store is a project that uses the Platzi API (https://fakeapi.platzi.com/ ) to create a web store using vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and Bootstrap. The focus of this project is to build a website with proper HTTP protocols, async functions, and an OOP. And see the figma here: https://n9.cl/a28ur
author: TasyDev <tamayocontat@gmail.com>
